message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is worth significantly more than its face value. For a limited time, I am willing to extend this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $120. This is a fantastic deal considering the high-quality features and benefits it offers. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the excellence of our product at a special rate.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $110 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to negotiate further. In response to your offer of $110, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $115. This still represents a great value given the quality of the product, and I believe it will be more appealing to you. Please let me know if this works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $115 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $112 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand your position, Bob. After reviewing the situation, I am willing to offer the product to you for $113. This price reflects the value of the product while allowing us to reach an agreement that is acceptable to both parties. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
I'm getting close to your offer, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $111 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Considering your latest offer, I am willing to sell the product to you for $112. This price still maintains a fair value for the product while allowing us to come to a mutually agreeable solution. I hope this offer is acceptable to you.
